title: My Kalimba
description: It is a creative platform where you can effortlessly and enjoyably play the kalimba directly in your browser.
option.title: Options
option.spaceincrease: The "Space" key increases the octave by 1
seo.description: My Kalimba — play the kalimba right in your browser!
instructions.title: Instructions
instructions.subtitle: This page helps you get started quickly, understand the options, and play the kalimba using mouse, touch, or your keyboard.
instructions.tip: Tip: if you play with the keyboard, enable “Keyboard control” in Options to see which keys match each note.
instructions.quickstart.title: Quick start
instructions.quickstart.step2: Wait until the instrument finishes loading (when the tines appear and you can press them).
instructions.quickstart.step3: Click/tap the kalimba tines to play notes.
instructions.quickstart.step4.suffix: to adjust volume, change keys count, switch soundfonts, and pick a keyboard scheme.
instructions.howToPlay.title: How to play
instructions.howToPlay.mouse.title: Mouse / Touch
instructions.howToPlay.mouse.bullet1: Click/tap a tine to play a note.
instructions.howToPlay.mouse.bullet2: Drag across tines to glide quickly.
instructions.howToPlay.mouse.bullet3: On mobile/tablet: use fullscreen for easier playing.
instructions.howToPlay.keyboard.title: Computer keyboard
instructions.howToPlay.keyboard.bullet1: In Options, use “Keyboard control” to choose a key scheme.
instructions.howToPlay.keyboard.bullet2: Matching keys show directly on each tine (small labels).
to raise the octave while playing.
instructions.howToPlay.keyboard.figureCa: Tip: pick a scheme to highlight the keys.
instructions.buttons.title: Quick controls
instructions.buttons.fullscreen: Toggle fullscreen to play more comfortably.
instructions.buttons.record: Start/stop recording the notes you play.
instructions.buttons.play: Play back your recording (enabled after you have one).
instructions.buttons.note: Note: in some browsers, audio will only start after your first interaction (click/tap).
instructions.options.title: Options explained
instructions.options.sound.title: Sound & notes
instructions.options.sound.baseNote: Change the base note (effectively changing pitch/key).
instructions.options.sound.keys: Set the number of kalimba tines (8–21).
instructions.options.sound.labelType: Choose whether to show numbers/letters on tines.
instructions.options.ui.title: UI & controls
instructions.options.ui.soundfonts: Change the instrument timbre — each soundfont feels different.
instructions.options.ui.keyboardControl: Pick a keyboard scheme; press Space to raise the octave.
instructions.images.keyboard.alt: Keyboard mapping and control scheme preview
instructions.troubleshooting.title: Troubleshooting
instructions.troubleshooting.noSound.bul: Try increasing Volume and check your system volume.
Click/tap once to “unlock” audio for the browser.
instructions.troubleshooting.keyboard.bu: Scroll to Options → Keyboard control and choose a scheme.
Make sure the page has focus (don’t focus a select/input).
If Space scrolls the page: the app blocks it, but some extensions may override it; try disabling related extensions.
